value.title: New Power BI Experience in Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be talking about the new Power BI experience in Microsoft Teams. During Ignite 2020, Microsoft announced a feature that, users can use Power BI Service from teams without leaving the context of Teams.
